net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.security

Class SelfSignedCertificateGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.security.SelfSignedCertificateGenerator

  • public class SelfSignedCertificateGenerator
extends Object
    A helper class to generate self-signed keypairs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  SelfSignedCertificateGenerator.CommandLineArgs
      Manages command line parsing for application and the bean properties used by the generator.
      static class  SelfSignedCertificateGenerator.FileConverter
      Command line option conversion from String to File.
